attributes.action: Remove Prime Minister Gordon Brown - It’s time for an election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A lot of people have now lost faith in Gordon Brown; he was elected without the publics consent.

Daily we hear nothing but news about rising prices for fuel, food and energy, which just proves putting a TAX MAN in charge, was the wrong thing to do.

He talks about the environment and Green tax’s etc, but has done nothing to push green energy for car drivers. What’s wrong with pushing Bio-diesel?

Converting Diesel cars would more beneficial and surely discounting the conversion would change a lot of people’s minds.
 
We didn’t vote for Gordon Brown, so why is he aloud to make a mess of this country.

It’s time for an election, before things deteriorate further.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
